metadata.name: FORBIDDEN APPLE 01
metadata.description:
There's a saying: if your desire is storng enough, there will be a sapling with one apple sprout in front you.

They say that if one were to eat that apple, their wish would come true... With the price of their most precious thing.

Are you prepared to lose one thing in exchange for another?

That apple was called the "Forbidden Apple".

Now, time for you to decide..
